overview: Ayanna Dozier assumes the character of a young woman who enters a love motel to re-train her emotions about love and sex in lovertits, a 4-minute film inspired in part by Charles Matton’s French erotica movie Spermula. In this version, the woman, who is seen bathing in a bikini in a heart-shaped bath, unsuccessfully attempts to embrace “superficial happiness, femininity and passiveness.” This film is part of the trilogy, "Close, but no Cigar." [Overview Courtesy of Ayanna Dozier]
title: lovertits
